entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023
